definition: wait a moment
class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once

sentences.english: It could be two or three times.
sentences.chinese: 恩，等一等，如果我想要排序一个列表。

sentences.english: Your room number is, just 8 moment, oh yes, it's 243.
sentences.chinese: 你的房间号码是，等一等，哦对了，是243。

sentences.english: But the 32-inch model we'd like to buy was temporarily out of stock. We had to wait.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们想买的32吋机种暂时缺货，所以得等一等。

sentences.english: Just a second and I'll check the schedule.
sentences.chinese: 请等一等，我来查一下时刻表。

sentences.english: Well, de Man says, "Wait a minute though.
But wait, an all-electric city would mean no cars.
sentences.chinese: 等一等，全电力城市也就意味着将没有汽车。

sentences.english: Delay. If you have an urge, wait.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有吸烟的冲动，先等一等。
哦，等一等，我还要拿一下皮包。

sentences.english: Hold down there - I don't know who you are.
sentences.chinese: 你说，先等一等，你不知道他是谁。

sentences.english: Now wait a second, you might say.
sentences.chinese: 现在请等一等，你可能会说。

sentences.english: One moment, please, and I'll find out what's available.
sentences.chinese: 请等一等，卡特先生，我查一下留言条。

sentences.english: Oberon: Wait, foolish fairy, why do you oppose me so?
sentences.chinese: 等一等，傻精灵，你为什么要违抗我？

sentences.english: On the one hand, he wants to wait before he talks.
sentences.chinese: 一方面，他想在他说话之前先等一等。

sentences.english: Just a minute,I will hot up your milk soon.
sentences.chinese: 稍等一等，我很快就能把你的奶热好。

sentences.english: Delay . If you have an urge, wait.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有吸烟的冲动，先等一等。

sentences.english: But I’m going to have to wait on that.
sentences.chinese: 但是，在这件事上我还是想在等一等。

definition: to wait a moment/later/in awhile
erhua variant of 等一會|等一会[deng3 yi1 hui4]
to wait a moment/do not go too soon
Don't worry!
variant of 少安毋躁[shao3 an1 wu2 zao4]
to wait a moment
to do sth more quickly/Hurry up!/Get a move on!
keep calm, don't get excited/don't be impatient
variant of 少安毋躁[shao3 an1 wu2 zao4]
to stop
erhua variant of 快點|快点[kuai4 dian3]
(said by departing guest) no need to see me out
you all (archaic)/see also 你們|你们[ni3 men5]
to desist/to stop/to stay one's hand
anxious/impatient
to stop/to bar the way
